name: LifeSeeker: A Kings Rise
description:
In LifeSeeker: Rise of a King, you play as Lord Sraleth one of many Vampire lord brothers and sisters. One day Sraleth decided to just get rid of his family and become the one and only Vampire king so all land belongs to himself, he was always the weak one, and got bullied by his Older siblings, and now it is his time!

Controlls for Controller you can check under "controls" keyboard and mouse are as follows: 

Change weapon: 1 (you can only attack when you got a weapon in your hands)

attack/magicattack: LMB/RMB

dodge: shift

glide: STRG/CTRL while in air and not in combat

target: TAB

This is a very early alpha, close to a demo but not really, i will fine tune it until august and start to promote it at this time around too. The release is set to end of 2024.

if you want to see the developement you can join my discord i post almost daily updates: https://discord.gg/Thb3EcxB

At the moment i am looking for sponsors so i can work on the game without having to worry about the release time and money i need to reach the goal release i set.

So if you are interested send me a mail: lifeseekerriseofaking@gmail.com
